 2020-10242020-12-11,  ,  ,  ,  JUS
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of FRÉDÉRIC PÉRODEAU of the City of Montréal, in the Province of Quebec, Barrister-at-law, to be a puisne Judge of the Superior Court of Quebec for the district of Montréal, with residence in the territory of Ville de Montréal or in the immediate vicinity thereof.
AttachmentsAttachment
